name: Ragdoll Destroy: Stickman
description:
In Ragdoll Destroy, you are going to damage the ragdoll as many crash as possible.
"Ragdoll Destroy" crash into bomb, crash into walls, horrifying motor stunts !

How To Play:
- Select your level map
- Select your vehicle and pose
- Tap and Hold on Start button to begin
- Tap Eject if you want

Features
- Multiple levels, vehicles and poses
- Sound effects attractive
- Use stickman for crash test

The game is like for those who like to watch the physics Monster Car, character stickman and destruction of various transport. Destroy and damage! Did you turn out amazing stunts! Hurry to disassemble the entire transport.
